document.full_text: over 8,000 entries have been received for this year's u.s. open at congressional country club in bethesda, maryland, the united states golf association said on friday.
document.title: over 8,000 entries accepted for 2011 u.s. open
lines_and_colors: over 8,000 entries have been received for this year's u.s. open at congressional country club in bethesda, maryland, the united states golf association said on friday.
